reviews.review_msg: Lectures are extremely dry, does not put any effort into making the material interesting at all and basically killed any interest I had in bioinformatics. Talks in one tone for the entire two hours of lecture. Labs are easy but do not enforce lecture material very well.

Nice guy. Doesn't put an effort into making the material more meaningful, he used someone elses slides. Labs were ok, got to leave early once you finished, labs didn't reinforce all the material. Fell asleep every class. You'll need lots of coffee! LOL cuz shiz hellz boring! The class would be better if there were two midterms instead of a final.
